item.title: I Broke My Computer...twice
item.description: _image from IT Crowd S1E5 I already messaged this to my friend already, so to keep myself from coming up with a new way to reformat those words, I’ll just paste what I messaged them here. I don’t have this blog listed on my resume or anything, so I feel like it would be kind of safe to curse on here. Albeit, if an employer is going through every repo and sees this they might be a little put off.
